```{r load-data}

```

```{r homelessness1}

communities %>% select(communityname,PctLess9thGrade,PctNotHSGrad,PctBSorMore, NumStreet, NumInShelters) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y=NumStreet, x=PctBSorMore))+
  geom_smooth(method = lm, colour="forestgreen")+
  geom_point(alpha=0.5)
#Nothing useful here
```

```{r homelessness2}
homelessness <- communities %>% 
  group_by(state) %>% 
  mutate(mean_homeless=mean(NumStreet), mean_shelter=mean(NumInShelters))
homelessness %>%   
ggplot(aes(x=state,y=mean_homeless))+
  geom_col()
homelessness %>% 
  select(state,mean_homeless,mean_shelter) %>% 
  filter(mean_homeless>0.15|mean_shelter>0.08) %>% 
  summarise(mean1=mean(mean_homeless), mean2=mean(mean_shelter))
```

```{r wage/employment/degree}
wed <- communities %>%
  select(PctBSorMore, perCapInc, PctEmploy, medIncome)
wed %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=PctBSorMore, y=perCapInc)) +
  geom_point(alpha=0.25)+
  geom_smooth(colour="aquamarine")+
  geom_smooth(method = lm)
wed %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=PctBSorMore, y=PctEmploy))+
  geom_point(alpha=0.25)+
  geom_smooth(colour="springgreen")+
  geom_smooth(method = lm)


```
